EmailTemplate.name: Current Trial: January 2016.Day 12 Engaged
EmailTemplate.subject: {{company.Company Name:default=Your store}} is almost ready to open
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're so close — quickly launch your online store. Pick a plan that's right for you. You're so close — quickly launch your online store The countdown is on! You're almost there, but you only have three days left in your free trial. Pick a plan that's right for you and get the time you need to launch your store.
Ready? Pick a plan <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> {{my.LitmusToken}}
